installation-note: copy this file into your savegame folder as 'gamedata/savegame/{worldname}/events.json' (remove 'example' from filename)
msgAllStarted: {startername} started an event! Use /eventjoin to participate
msgPrivStopped: {stoppername} stopped the event! You've been warped back
msgAllStopped: {stoppername} stopped the event! Thanks for participating
